meanings.definition: The state or quality of being wrongheaded.
meanings.sent1: Her stubborn wrongheadednesses made it difficult to convince her to try new things.
meanings.sent2: His wrongheadednesses often led him to make decisions that were not in his best interest.
meanings.sent3: Despite his wrongheadednesses, he always managed to see the bright side of things.
meanings.sent4: The company's success was hindered by the wrongheadednesses of its leadership.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's patience was tested by the students' wrongheadednesses in understanding the lesson.

meanings.definition: The tendency to have incorrect or misguided opinions or beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The politician's wrongheadednesses on the issue cost him the support of many voters.
meanings.sent2: It is important to challenge our own wrongheadednesses in order to grow and learn.
meanings.sent3: Despite his wrongheadednesses, he always managed to see the bright side of things.
meanings.sent4: The wrongheadednesses of the conspiracy theorists led to widespread panic.
meanings.sent5: The team's success was hindered by the wrongheadednesses of its strategy.
